items.name: getting_started
items.title: Getting Started with Ext JS 4
items.description: This introduction to Ext JS 4 explains how you can get started with creating your first application.

items.name: upgrade
items.title: Upgrade Guide
items.description: Learn what's new in Ext JS 4.0 and how to upgrade your existing applications.

items.name: upgrade_41
items.title: Upgrade 4.0 to 4.1
items.description: Learn what's new in Ext JS 4.1 and how to upgrade your 4.0 applications.

items.name: performance
items.title: Performance Guide
items.description: Best practices and concepts for creating performant Ext JS apps.

items.name: class_system
items.title: The Class System
items.description: This manual is intended for any developer who wants to create new or extend existing classes with the new class system in Ext JS 4.x.

items.name: application_architecture
items.title: MVC Application Architecture
items.description: Ext JS 4 comes with a new application architecture that not only organizes your code but reduces the amount you have to write.

items.name: layouts_and_containers
items.title: Layouts and Containers
items.description: The layout system handles the sizing and positioning of every component in your application.

items.name: components
items.title: Components
items.description: A simple example, and videos, about how to create components in Ext JS.

items.name: data
items.title: The Data Package
items.description: The data package is what loads and saves all of the data in your application.

items.name: drag_and_drop
items.title: Drag and Drop
items.description: This guide explains how to use the drag and drop system.

items.name: localization
items.title: Localization
items.description: This guide explains how to localize your application for multiple languages.

items.name: keyboard_nav
items.title: Keyboard Navigation
items.description: This guide explains how to use the keyboard navigation system.

items.name: testing
items.title: Unit Testing
items.description: This guide explains how to use Jasmine to unit test your projects.

items.name: grid
items.title: The Grid Component
items.description: The grid provides a great way to view lots of data at once, formatted exactly how you need it.

items.name: tree
items.title: Trees
items.description: Tree and grid now both extend from the same base class. All of the benefits of grid can now be used on trees.

items.name: drawing_and_charting
items.title: Drawing and Charting
items.description: The drawing and charting packages enable you to create cross browser and cross device graphics in a versatile way.

items.name: forms
items.title: The Form Package
items.description: The Form package enables you to create powerful forms backed with the Ext Data package

items.name: theming
items.title: Theming
items.description: This guide explains how to use the theming system to customize the look and feel of your application.
